And when she opened her eyes again, she found herself at that place.\n\nThe forest where the empire’s most despised species lived.","ko":"약혼자에게 버림받고, 30명의 남편을 얻다!'\n\n평범한 회사원 '서지우(31/여)'는 갑작스레 낯선 세계로 차원 이동된다. 치유 능력을 가진 '성녀'로서의 현실을 받아들이고, \n황태자 '알레프(31/남)'의 연인으로서 제국과 신전을 위해 5년을 헌신한다. \n하지만 그녀를 이용만 하고 버린 황태자로 인해 상처받은 지우는 절벽 아래로 몸을 던지고...\n\n원하던 죽음 대신 눈을 뜬 곳은 제국이 멸시하는 이종족들의 숲. \n목숨을 구해준 엘프 '란스일'에게 서서히 마음을 열게 된 지우는 그를 따라 이종족들과 살게 된다. \n'성녀'의 능력으로, 마기에 오염된 엘프들의 신수(神樹) '엘란도스'를 정화해주고, \n이를 계기로 란스일을 비롯한 30명의 신비하고도 아름다운 이종족 남자들로부터 '특별'한 청혼을 받는데!"},"links":{"ap":"at-the-end-of-the-hidden-greenery","kt":"at-the-end-of-the-hidden-greenery","mu":"6usdl3d","raw":"https://page.kakao.com/content/65025291"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"65761a2a-415e-47f3-bef2-a9dababba7a6","name":{"en":"Reverse Harem"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}}]}

If you want to leave this village safely...\" \n\nMoriya Tou was at the peak of happiness. His girlfriend Kasumi accepted his marriage proposal. To prevent this calamity from happening, four sacred tournaments are held one year prior to her birth to train and select a party of heroes strong enough to slay her. 99 years have passed since the first witch was born and felled, and the next cycle of tournaments are soon to begin. Follow Agni, a young alchemist with a penchant for explosives and revelry as she gathers her own party of wannabe heroes to participate in the tournaments and uncover the mystery behind the witch's true origins.","es":"Cada diez años, una chica recibe los nefastos poderes de una bruja cuya única meta es destruir el mundo. As a result, there's very few girls in the school. To protect the girls from the starving hordes of wolves (boys), a special group is formed. The head of that group is handsome, smart and strong; everything a girl would like, right? The only problem is that he hates girls (no he's not gay). Of course, our main character falls in love at first sight, but she's got her own problem. She can't be honest about her feelings and constantly acts like she hates the guy.
